Our Staff

Heather Brown

Director of Guards

Heather Brown has been part of the Seguin family for the past several years and has aided the growth of both the Matador Guard and the marching band as well. She has worked at various high schools throughout Texas, and spends the summers with competitive Drum and Bugle Corps. She has served as a tour director for the Blue Knights Drum and Bugle Corps and is currently the tour director for the Troopers.

Camille Wilson

Assistant Guard Tech.

Camille Wilson is a Houston-native and current student at Texas State University. She has performed in various Color Guards and Winterguards over the past decade, including the College Park High School Color and Winterguard, Identity Independent and the Blue Knight Drum and Bugle Corps. She has taught at Seguin for the past four years.
